content: - 20 minutes size medium only k until marker slip press out water with a towel place on sock marker k1 ssk k until 3 sts before marker blockers or lay flat to air dry k2tog k1 16 20 24 sts remain enjoy your passion-knit socks 6 copyright kayla baldwin 2025 this pattern is for personal use only it is not to be copied and distributed in any part it is not permissible to sell finished items made from this pattern without express permission from the author contact kayla baldwin is mother to 3 little boys and loves to knit crochet and spin yarn specializing in sock knitting intricate patterns with a botanical focus follow on ravelry and instagram for more upcoming designs ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/kayla-baldwin instagram https //www instagram com/natural knits/ abbreviations and techniques st s stitch es k knit p purl bor beginning of round sl slip one stitch generally purlwise unless otherwise indicated yo yarnover create a hole by wrapping the strand of working yarn over the needle k2tog knit 2 sts together 1 st decreased ssk slip 2 stitches as if to knit insert left needle into the stitches from back to front k2tog ds double stitch with working yarn in front slip next stitch purlwise pull working yarn until the two legs of the elongated stitch are showing see photo tutorial at bottom of pattern dip dipstitch insert right needle into 2nd knit stitch on left needle 3 row below grab working yarn pull through dip into same stitch for second dip see photo tutorial at bottom of pattern steven west fir rib dip stitch for youtube video tutorial 7 passion-knit socks - main repeat- chart and written instructions row 1 k3 dip x 2 k2 row 2 k3 sl x 2 k2 row 3 k3 ssk k1 k2tog k2 row 4 k8 row 5 k2 dip k5 dip k1 row 6 k2 sl k5 sl k1 row 7 k1 k2tog k5 ssk row 8 k8 passion-knit socks - size small - top of foot - chart and written instructions row 1 k4 k3 dip x 2 k2 x 2 k4 row 2 k4 k3 sl x 2 k2 x 2 k4 row 3 k4 k3 ssk k1 k2tog k2 x 2 k4 row 4 knit row 5 k3 dip k1 k2 dip k5 dip k1 x 2 k2 dip k2 row 6 k3 sl k1 k2 sl k5 sl k1 x 2 k2 sl k2 row 7 k3 ssk k1 k2tog k5 ssk x 2 k1 k2tog k2 row 8 knit 8 passion-knit socks -
